pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiplex Ligation-Dependent Probe Amplification Data Analysis // Functions to import Applied Biosystems data files of multiplex ligation-dependent probe amplification (MLPA) analysis and process them. Gene-expression profiling methods are described in Mareschal, Ruminy et al (2015) doi:10.1016/j.jmoldx.2015.01.007. Gene-fusion detection methods are described in Mareschal, Palau et al (under review).
